name: Whanganui Riverboat Centre Museum
openingHours:
航行周六 10:30 上午 & 12 下午 1 小时特别班次-20.00 美元 pp 或 $50.00 的家庭。
帆船航行的星期天 11 上午-3 小时野餐

offers.description:
Museum: Free (Donations accepted)
2 hour Cruises: $39 Adult, $35 Seniors, $15 Child (5-15yr), Under 5 Free, $89 Family Concession
Group concessions are available (20+ passengers) see website for details
